short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop wasting your time on crap sites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distract yourself from distraction. If you find you're spending time on junk sites, set yourself a limit and Sax will remind you when you've had too much - back to being productive in no time.
